thread.title: BRIEF-Novartis AG CEO Says Believes Avexis SMA Medicine Has Multi-Billion Dollar Peak Sales Potential

title: BRIEF-Novartis AG CEO Says Believes Avexis SMA Medicine Has Multi-Billion Dollar Peak Sales Potential

organizations.name: has multi-billion dollar peak sales potential reuters

text:
April 9, 2018 / 6:44 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Novartis AG CEO Says Believes Avexis SMA Medicine Has Multi-Billion Dollar Peak Sales Potential Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 9 (Reuters) - Novartis Ag: 
* CEO SAYS PLANS TO USE PORTION OF GSK CONSUMER JOINT VENTURE TRANSACTION PROCEEDS TO BUY AVEXIS 
* CEO SAYS BELIEVES AVEXIS MAIN SMA MEDICINE HAS MULTI-BILLION DOLLAR PEAK SALES POTENTIAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by John Miller)
